task.organize_language_files.organize_files(root_dir: str, dist_dir: str) → int[source]

Organizes the files from the source dir to the dist dir

Parameters:

  • root_dir (str) – path to the source directory

  • dist_dir (str) – path to the distenation directory

Returns:

the length of the sorted directory. not recursive!

Return type:
